name: Jasper
headerTaglineFour: based in Ho Chi Minh, Vietnam

services.title: Web Developer
services.description:
Build high-performance web applications using modern stacks:
- React/Next.js & Vue/Nuxt.js SPAs/PWAs
- TypeScript-driven development
- Node.js backend systems
- Firebase/Netlify integrated solutions
- SEO-optimized Jamstack architecture
- Enterprise-grade authentication systems
- Real-time features with WebSockets

services.title: Performance Optimization
services.description: Advanced memoization, code splitting, and bundle analysis

services.title: Migration Services
services.description: Modernize legacy systems with React/Vue upgrades, TypeScript conversion, and framework transitions (Next.js/Nuxt.js). Includes hybrid operation support, automated testing, and team training for seamless transitions.

services.title: Server-Side Rendering (SSR) Solutions
services.description: Deliver SEO-optimized, high-performance apps via Next.js/Nuxt.js SSR/SSG hybrid architectures. Features edge caching, code splitting, and enterprise-grade auth/monitoring integrations.

aboutpara:
Hello,
I am a front-end developer specializing in crafting outstanding user experiences. With expertise in React.js, Vue.js, and the broader JavaScript ecosystem, I build dynamic, responsive interfaces that are both user-friendly and visually engaging. Additionally, I bring strong SEO skills, applying best practices to optimize websites for search engines and enhance online visibility.
With five years of industry experience, I am dedicated to delivering front-end solutions that enable businesses to achieve their objectives efficiently and effectively. I look forward to the opportunity to contribute to the success of your project.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed in React, JavaScript, and most of the Web frameworks.

experiences.position: Software Engineer at The Access Group
Frontend Engineer at Collaboration Betters The World
experiences.bullets: Worked on the frontend of a React application, committed to driving our vision at CBTW to better the world through collaboration.

experiences.position: Frontend Engineer at Hello Health Group
experiences.bullets: - I'm an experienced developer who is passionate about building high-performance websites and components. - I spend my days creating component libraries using Storybook and integrating with Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Google Ads, Pubmatic, and MGID. - I'm also proficient in agile scrum methodologies and always seeking new opportunities to grow and learn in my career. - I'm always excited to bring my expertise to a new role and help build outstanding products.
